text: Morning! i don’t know if you ever encountered this situation, and I haven’t found anything yet related to that, so every macro I import to the CSS there’s warnings all over the place saying that they couldn’t find the method when I apply it. After rendering the page, I know it works but it bothers me that there are underline warnings everywhere and I couldn’t find a solution yet. Has anyone fixed this by any chance?

Hi All question about my sandbox environment, is it possible to use cookies there? trying to fill up my cookie with a simple setCookie() function, but nothing happens.. if anybody can help me out here, would be awesome! thanks
I haven’t run into that limitation in the past, either on CMS sandboxes or app test accounts

oke, i have found what the issue was, i couldn’t set a cookie.. but in my setCookie function i set the domain also, so by removing that line i could again set the cookie in my sandbox environment.. so somewhat of a brainfart at my end :shushing_face::grimacing:
